column4: This is a printing question; I have a single sided printer, I have a lecture notes 40 pages long, I want to print 2-pages on 1 both sides using then even and odd functions modes on the printer settings any idea

This is a printing question; I have a single sided printer, I have a lecture notes 40 pages long, I want to print 2-pages on 1 both sides using then even and odd functions modes on the printer settings any ideas?
if i print even/odd it will mess up the order though
seem adobe reader has an option to print odd pages and even so you could export to pdf in openoffice and print from adobe reader http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=70343
